subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: Auto manufacturers and Nascar teams made a multimillion-dollar investment to build racecars that look more like those at dealerships, in an attempt to connect with consumers.
snippet: Auto manufacturers and Nascar teams made a multimillion-dollar investment to build racecars that look more like those at dealerships, in an attempt to connect with consumers.
